message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get the remaining 10%.  What do you say?
You took 90% last round, so I'll offer a compromise this time. 60 for me and 40 for you. It's a fair deal!
I'm willing to meet you halfway this time. 55 for me and 45 for you.  It's a fair deal considering the inflation, don't you think?
You met me halfway, now it's my turn to do the same. 50 for both of us. Let's split it down the middle and be done with it!
